2012720.name: イド - ido -
2012720.description:
Mysterious world

The Mysterious child wakes up in a strange world. Unsure of where he is and who he is, he is asked by "Ido," a talking tree, to connect the world. As he "explores" the mysterious world, connects "roads" and interacts with the world's inhabitants, he arrives at the truth of the world.

In addition to the unique game experience of adventure, abandonment, and infrastructure maintenance, "encounters" and "interactions" with unique characters will lead players into a mysterious world.

Game Contents

It is divided into an adventure part and a simulation part.

adventure part
The "doors" are objects that allow you to meet the characters behind the doors. The story progresses as you meet and talk with these characters.



simulation part

This is the part where "doors" are connected with " roads". Connecting roads activates doors and allows you to meet new characters. To create a road, you must collect the necessary materials and place them one square at a time.
Materials are obtained from objects on the field. For example, the material needed for a road is rock. Rocks can be obtained by mining nearby rock objects.



There are facilities that are useful for placing many roads. Each facility requires its own materials. Let's collect materials, build convenient facilities, and efficiently collect many materials to create roads.

For example, create a more comfortable environment for creating roads by building facilities such as the following

  • Facilities to revitalize land
  • Instant warp facilities
  • Facilities to store materials
  • Characters to help you build

This is a shot of a road being built. To build, the player selects the facility to be built from the toolbar at the bottom of the screen and places it. Once placed, the building is activated by the player by putting in the materials.
